$description: Light theme shadow tokens. References core shadow primitives for consistent elevation across the design system.

xs.$description: Extra small shadow - minimal elevation. Use for: subtle depth on cards at rest, input fields.

sm.$description: Small shadow - low elevation. Use for: card hover states, raised buttons.

md.$description: Medium shadow - moderate elevation. Use for: dropdown menus, popovers, tooltips.

lg.$description: Large shadow - high elevation. Use for: dialogs, modals, drawers.

xl.$description: Extra large shadow - maximum elevation. Use for: critical modals, full-screen overlays.

footer.$description: Footer shadow - upward-casting. Use for: sticky footers, bottom navigation bars.
